20101228220605.000|20101228220606.000|CC1|>> I DON'T THINK SO OTHER THAN

20101228220610.000|20101228220612.000|CC1|DONE IN THE LAST CONGRESS.

20101228220613.000|20101228220615.000|CC1|GOING TO COME AFTER HEALTH CARE

20101228223548.000|20101228223550.000|CC1|HAVE WE SET UP AN UNSTABLE      
20101228223550.000|20101228223551.000|CC1|SITUATION THAT WILL CAUSE MORE  
20101228223551.000|20101228223552.000|CC1|WARS IN THE FUTURE?             
20101228223552.000|20101228223553.000|CC1|>> WELL, IT IS AN UNSTABLE      
20101228223553.000|20101228223554.000|CC1|SITUATION.                      
20101228223554.000|20101228223556.000|CC1|I'M NOT SURE WHAT IT CAUSES MORE
20101228223556.000|20101228223600.000|CC1|WARS BUT WE'RE NOT OUT OF THE   
20101228223600.000|20101228223602.000|CC1|WORDS YET AND THEY'RE NOT OUT OF
20101228223602.000|20101228223602.000|CC1|THE WOODS YET.                  
20101228223602.000|20101228223604.000|CC1|THE ISSUE OF WE HAVE ONE MORE   
20101228223604.000|20101228223606.000|CC1|YEAR THERE AND A LOT CAN HAPPEN 
20101228223606.000|20101228223607.000|CC1|IN THAT TIME PERIOD.            
20101228223607.000|20101228223609.000|CC1|A LOT CAN HAPPEN IMMEDIATELY    
20101228223609.000|20101228223610.000|CC1|AFTERWARDS.                     
20101228223610.000|20101228223611.000|CC1|BUT I THINK WE'LL GET A GOOD    
20101228223611.000|20101228223613.000|CC1|INDICATION DURING THE NEXT YEAR 
20101228223613.000|20101228223614.000|CC1|AS TO WHETHER OR NOT AL MALIKI  
20101228223614.000|20101228223618.000|CC1|HAS THE SUPPORT BASE, IS ABLE TO
20101228223618.000|20101228223619.000|CC1|RECONCILE COMPETING FACTIONS.   
20101228223619.000|20101228223620.000|CC1|FORMING A GOVERNMENT WAS PART OF
20101228223620.000|20101228223621.000|CC1|THE SOLUTION.                   
20101228223621.000|20101228223623.000|CC1|THERE'S A LOT MORE YET TO BE    
20101228223623.000|20101228223623.000|CC1|DONE.                           
20101228223623.000|20101228223624.000|CC1|I DON'T THINK IT BECOMES AN     
20101228223624.000|20101228223625.000|CC1|OUTPOST OF IRAN BUT IT CAN      
20101228223625.000|20101228223626.000|CC1|BECOME A PROBLEM.               
20101228223626.000|20101228223628.000|CC1|>> OKAY.                        
20101228223628.000|20101228223630.000|CC1|BY BIG REASON FOR OPPOSING THE  
20101228223630.000|20101228223631.000|CC1|IRAQ WAR BESIDES COMMON SENSE IS
20101228223631.000|20101228223633.000|CC1|YOU GO INTO A REGION AND THEN   
20101228223633.000|20101228223635.000|CC1|COME HOME AND IT GOES BACK TO   
20101228223635.000|20101228223636.000|CC1|WHERE IT WAS BEFORE IT STARTED. 
20101228223636.000|20101228223638.000|CC1|IF THE SUNNIS ALWAYS RAN THAT   
20101228223638.000|20101228223640.000|CC1|COUNTRY, WE KNOCKED OFF SADDAM  
20101228223640.000|20101228223642.000|CC1|HUSSEIN, THEY WENT INTO HIDING, 
20101228223642.000|20101228223643.000|CC1|THE ARMY TOOK OFF THEIR UNIFORMS
20101228223643.000|20101228223645.000|CC1|AND DISAPPEAR WED THEIR GUNS.   
20101228223645.000|20101228223647.000|CC1|AREN'T THEY JUST WAITING FOR US 
20101228223647.000|20101228223647.000|CC1|TO LEAVE?                       
20101228223647.000|20101228223649.000|CC1|THE MINUTE WE LEAVE, THEY BEGIN 
20101228223649.000|20101228223650.000|CC1|THEIR INSURGENCY?               
20101228223650.000|20101228223652.000|CC1|>> THE U.S. ENTERED INTO A MUCH,
20101228223652.000|20101228223654.000|CC1|MUCH LONGER CONFLICT.           
20101228223654.000|20101228223655.000|CC1|SADDAM HUSSEIN WAS ONE OF MANY, 
20101228223655.000|20101228223656.000|CC1|MANY SUNNI LEADERS IN IRAQ.     
20101228223656.000|20101228223657.000|CC1|HE WAS A TERRIBLE DICTATOR.

20101228223705.000|20101228223705.000|CC1|THAT UP.
